title: Examples of Romanian typography
content:
What comes to mind typographically when you think of Romania? I am looking for anything from specific fonts, to popular styles, to general trends, to examples of work printed in Romania. Or any designers, publishers, websites, books, etc. that you feel are representative of the culture.

Historical and contemporary examples are both appreciated.

I realize this a very broad question, I am just looking for ideas to get me started. I am designing a piece where I want include some allusions to Romanian culture.
author: cumaso
